changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION notify_klink_change() RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$ BEGIN PERFORM pg_notify( 'klink_change', json_build_object( 'operation', CASE WHEN TG_OP = 'INSERT' THEN 'inserted' WHEN TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN 'updated' WHEN TG_OP = 'DELETE' THEN 'deleted' END, 'row', row_to_json(COALESCE(NEW, OLD)) )::text); RETURN NEW; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

changeSet.author: Nikola Drljaca
changeSet.sql: -- create trigger to run notify function after change CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER klink_change_notify AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE OR DELETE ON klink FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION notify_klink_change();
